name: abstract_gears_background.jpg
description: A full image of an intricate, abstract network of metallic gears and cogs, with a dark, industrial, and slightly glowing aesthetic.

name: bright_sky.jpg
description: A full image of a vibrant, bright blue sky with fluffy, white clouds on a sunny day.

name: city-background.jpg
description: A full image of a bustling city skyline at dusk, with lights starting to turn on in the buildings.

name: rainy-city.jpg
description: A full image of a city street at night in the rain, with reflections of neon lights shimmering on the wet pavement.

name: city_background.jpg
description: A full image of a sprawling modern cityscape viewed from a high vantage point during the day.

name: tech_city_background.jpg
description: A full image of a futuristic city with holographic advertisements and sleek, high-tech architecture, glowing with neon blue and purple lights.

name: sunrise-field.jpg
description: A full image of a beautiful sunrise over a vast, open field with golden light rays piercing through the morning mist.

name: tech_cityscape.jpg
description: A full image of a futuristic cityscape at night, characterized by glowing data streams and circuit board patterns integrated into the architecture.

name: blueprint_bg.jpg
description: A full image of a detailed technical blueprint, with white lines and diagrams on a classic blue background.

name: data_center_background.jpg
description: A full image of a large, modern data center, showing long aisles of server racks with blinking LED lights.

name: dark_clouds.jpg
description: A full image of a dramatic, stormy sky filled with dark, ominous clouds just before a storm.

name: winding-path.jpg
description: A full image of a winding path or road leading through a serene forest or mountain landscape.

name: sky-background.jpg
description: A full image of a clear, expansive blue sky, perfect for a background.

name: empty_city_street_background.jpg
description: A full image of a wide, empty city street, viewed from a low angle, surrounded by tall buildings, giving a sense of solitude.

name: data-center-background.jpg
description: A full image of a high-tech data center hall, with rows of glowing server racks stretching into the distance.

name: server-room.jpg
description: A full image looking down an aisle in a server room, with racks of computer equipment on both sides, filled with blinking green and blue lights.

name: gears-background.png
description: A complex arrangement of colourful, interlocking metallic gears of various sizes, on a white background.

name: mountains-far.png
description: A colourful silhouette of a distant mountain range with multiple layers, creating a sense of depth, on a white background.

name: gears-midground.png
description: Several large, colourful, and detailed mechanical gears appearing to be part of a larger machine, on a white background.

name: stock-chart-midground.png
description: A colourful, glowing line graph representing a stock chart that is trending upwards, on a white background.

name: single-tree.png
description: A single, colourful, healthy tree with a full canopy of green leaves and a strong trunk, standing alone, on a white background.

name: falling-chart.png
description: A colourful, glowing stock market chart with a red line dramatically falling downwards, indicating a crash, on a white background.

name: city-skyline-mid.png
description: The colourful silhouette of a modern city skyline, featuring various skyscrapers and buildings, on a white background.

name: modern_city.png
description: A cluster of colourful, sleek, modern skyscrapers with glass facades, viewed from a slightly low angle, on a white background.

name: amazon_warehouse_midground.png
description: The interior of a colourful, massive Amazon fulfillment center, showing rows of shelves stacked with products and conveyor belts, on a white background.

name: cloud_servers_midground.png
description: A colourful, stylized representation of cloud computing, with abstract cloud shapes interconnected with glowing lines and server icons, on a white background.

name: fortress.png
description: A colourful, imposing, ancient stone fortress or castle with high walls and towers, viewed from the front, on a white background.

name: server-racks-midground.png
description: A row of colourful, detailed server racks filled with hardware and blinking lights, viewed from a side angle, on a white background.

name: buildings_midground.png
description: A group of colourful, generic modern office buildings of varying heights, on a white background.

name: broken_gears.png
description: A pile of colourful, rusted, and broken gears and machine parts, suggesting a state of disrepair, on a white background.

name: forest-midground.png
description: A dense line of colourful trees representing a forest edge, with layers of trees to create depth, on a white background.

name: data_overlay_foreground.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay of glowing, futuristic data, numbers, and graphs, meant to be placed over a video, on a white background.

name: buildings-foreground.png
description: The detailed, colourful tops of several modern skyscrapers viewed from a low angle, as if looking up from the street, on a white background.

name: glowing-data.png
description: A colourful, abstract stream of glowing binary code (0s and 1s) and light particles flowing across the screen, on a white background.

name: soundwaves_overlay.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay of stylized, oscillating soundwaves or an audio waveform, on a white background.

name: delivery_drone_foreground.png
description: A colourful, modern delivery drone with four propellers, carrying a small package, flying towards the viewer, on a white background.

name: digital_grid.png
description: A colourful, glowing digital grid with a perspective effect, as if moving through a virtual space, on a white background.

name: cracked_glass_overlay.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay of realistic cracks spreading from a central point, as if the screen is broken, on a white background.

name: biohazard_symbol_overlay.png
description: The iconic, colourful biohazard symbol, appearing slightly worn or distressed, as a semi-transparent overlay, on a white background.

name: amazon_box_foreground.png
description: A colourful, standard Amazon cardboard shipping box with the smile logo, sitting at a slight angle, on a white background.

name: sad-people.png
description: A colourful silhouette of a group of people with slumped shoulders and downturned heads, conveying sadness or defeat, on a white background.

name: glowing_particles.png
description: A colourful, scattered cloud of out-of-focus, glowing dust particles or bokeh lights, on a white background.

name: data_stream.png
description: A colourful, dynamic stream of glowing digital information, represented by lines and dots, flowing from one point to another, on a white background.

name: rain_overlay.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent overlay of falling raindrops and water streaks to simulate a rainy window effect, on a white background.

name: phoenix_from_ashes.png
description: A colourful, magnificent phoenix with fiery wings rising from a pile of ashes, symbolizing rebirth, on a white background.

name: gears-foreground.png
description: A close-up of two or three large, colourful, intricate mechanical gears turning and interlocking, on a white background.

name: resilient-plant.png
description: A single, small colourful plant or sprout growing through a crack in a concrete surface, symbolizing resilience, on a white background.

name: data_stream_foreground.png
description: A dense, colourful, and complex stream of glowing digital data, lines, and numbers flowing directly towards the camera, on a white background.

name: aws-logo.png
description: The official, colourful Amazon Web Services (AWS) logo, clean and sharp, on a white background.

name: tech-overlay-foreground.png
description: A colourful, semi-transparent futuristic user interface (HUD) overlay with glowing geometric shapes, data readouts, and circuit patterns, on a white background.
